PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MobileTelecommunicationsApplianceTypeMobileSwitchingCenter
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsAppliance and types of IfcMobileTelecommunicationsApplianceType with the predefined type set to MOBILESWITCHINGCENTER.

PropertyDef.Name: UserCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the user capacity of the device, defined as the maximum number of users that can be active at the same time.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfInterfaces
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the types of interfaces and their number in the device.

PropertyDef.Name: MaximumNumberOfManagedBSCs
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the maximum number of base station controller (BSC) that can be managed simultaneously by the mobile switching center (MSC).
